glsa.title: LTSP: Authentication bypass in included LibVNCServer code
glsa.synopsis: LTSP includes a version of libVNCServer that is vulnerable to an authentication bypass.

background.p: The Linux Terminal Server Project adds thin-client support to Linux servers.

description.p: The LTSP server includes vulnerable LibVNCServer code, which fails to properly validate protocol types effectively letting users decide what protocol to use, such as "Type 1 - None" (GLSA-200608-05). The LTSP VNC server will accept this security type, even if it is not offered by the server.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access with the privileges of the user running the VNC server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
